title: Game will not open
body: I am running LoL on a Mac with current OS.  The game has stopped opening.  I click the icon, it bounces once, and never opens.  I am trying to reinstall and even downloaded the hex tech repair tool.  It did nothing to help.  I tried uninstalling but it won't let me, according to the instructions given to me by the Mac tool bar.  Help me quick!!!! I am going into withdrawals!!!

replies.body: Sounds like the client isn't able to access it's game files due to not having all of the permissions it needs. Double check your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) settings to make sure everything is setup properly there, but let me know if that doesn't help.
